member.name: T:Goedel.Cryptography.Test.Initialization
member.summary: Static class whose only function is to contain the initialization routine.

member.name: P:Goedel.Cryptography.Test.Initialization.Initialized
member.summary: Initialization witness flag. This may be used to force initialization of the module prior to other modules being initialized.
